value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12223v1", "title": "Superspecial representations of Weyl groups", "summary": "We define a subset of the set of special representations of a Weyl group.\nThis subset contains at most one representation.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT", "published": "2025-04-16T16:15:43Z"}
